{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Content Manager",
  "description": "Zion Homes Drama Outreach Ministry is a film production company with operations in Nigeria and United Kingdom. We are a UK-registered creative arts and entertainment company, established with a mission to produce, manage, and distribute creative works across film, live performances, and digital media. Zionhome prides at producing very relatable, high quality faithbased movies.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Content Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Osogbo, Osun
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Develop and implement content strategies for movies.
	Oversee the creation of content for various platforms, such as social media, websites, and promotional materials.
	Manage content calendars to ensure timely release of content across various platforms.
	Develop and implement social media strategies to promote movies and engage with audiences.
	Track and analyze content performance, providing insights and recommendations for improvement.


Job Requirements


	Must be able to adjust to flexible working hours (9 am-5 pm, Mondays to Fridays, and some nights or weekends when required).
	Must be willing to relocate to Osogbo, Osun state, as the roles are on-site.
	Must be a Christian and have proven integrity (2 reference letters will be required before appointment).


Skills and Ability:


	Proven experience in content creation and management, film production, or a related industry.
	Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to work effectively with various stakeholders.
	Ability to think creatively and develop innovative content strategies.
	Strong attention to detail.
	Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously, prioritizing tasks and meeting deadlines.
	Strong understanding of the film industry, including trends, best practices, and emerging technologies.
	Ability to analyze data and metrics, providing insights and recommendations for improvement.
",
  "datePosted": "2025-11-05",
  "validThrough": "2025-12-06",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",

    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Zion Homes Drama Outreach Ministry"
    
  },

Content Manager Job at Zion Homes Drama Outreach Ministry




        
    

        
        Zion Homes Drama Outreach Ministry is a film production company with operations in Nigeria and United Kingdom. We are a UK-registered creative arts and entertainment company, established with a mission to produce, manage, and distribute creative works across film, live performances, and digital media. Zionhome prides at producing very relatable, high quality faithbased movies.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Content Manager

Job Location: Osogbo, Osun
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Develop and implement content strategies for movies.
	Oversee the creation of content for various platforms, such as social media, websites, and promotional materials.
	Manage content calendars to ensure timely release of content across various platforms.
	Develop and implement social media strategies to promote movies and engage with audiences.
	Track and analyze content performance, providing insights and recommendations for improvement.


Job Requirements


	Must be able to adjust to flexible working hours (9 am-5 pm, Mondays to Fridays, and some nights or weekends when required).
	Must be willing to relocate to Osogbo, Osun state, as the roles are on-site.
	Must be a Christian and have proven integrity (2 reference letters will be required before appointment).


Skills and Ability:


	Proven experience in content creation and management, film production, or a related industry.
	Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to work effectively with various stakeholders.
	Ability to think creatively and develop innovative content strategies.
	Strong attention to detail.
	Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously, prioritizing tasks and meeting deadlines.
	Strong understanding of the film industry, including trends, best practices, and emerging technologies.
	Ability to analyze data and metrics, providing insights and recommendations for improvement.
    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Inventory / Buying Officer - Supermarket",
  "description": "Don Quester Consulting is a Management Consulting Organization. We offer bespoke interventions focused on significantly improving individual effectiveness and organizational performance. Our customized solutions are focused on helping individuals, organizations and communities realize their potentials and express new possibilities.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Inventory / Buying Officer - Supermarket

Job Location:&nbsp;ojota Lagos,
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are looking for a skilled Inventory / Buying Officer to handle procurement, supplier coordination, and ensure the supermarket maintains optimal stock levels and product quality.
	Key Responsibilities
	Source and negotiate with suppliers for quality products.
	Prepare and process purchase orders.
	Track stock levels and reorder timelines.
	Maintain supplier records and purchase databases.
	Collaborate with finance and operations on restocking plans.


Requirements


	B.Sc/ND in Procurement, Supply Chain, or related field.
	3 &ndash; 5 years of procurement or inventory experience.
	Excellent negotiation and record-keeping skills.
	Proactive and organized individual.


Salary
N150,000 - N200,000 per month.

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their&nbsp; CV to:&nbsp;jobs@donquester.com&nbsp;using&nbsp;&ldquo;Inventory / Buying Officer &ndash; Ojota Supermarket&rdquo; as the subject of the mail.",
  "datePosted": "2025-11-05",
  "validThrough": "2025-11-28",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Don Quester Consulting"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",
    "address": {
      "@type": "PostalAddress",
       "postalCode": ". ",
       "addressRegion": ". ",
       "streetAddress": ". ",
      "addressLocality": "Lagos",
      "addressCountry": "NG"
     
      
    }
  },
  "identifier": {
    "@type": "PropertyValue",
    "name": "",
    "value": "189928"
  },
  "baseSalary": {
    "@type": "MonetaryAmount",
    "currency": "NGN",

      "minValue": 150000,
      "maxValue": 250000,
      "unitText": "MONTH"
    }
  }
}



Inventory / Buying Officer - Supermarket Job at Don Quester Consulting




        
    

        
        Don Quester Consulting is a Management Consulting Organization. We offer bespoke interventions focused on significantly improving individual effectiveness and organizational performance. Our customized solutions are focused on helping individuals, organizations and communities realize their potentials and express new possibilities.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Inventory / Buying Officer - Supermarket

Job Location: ojota Lagos,
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are looking for a skilled Inventory / Buying Officer to handle procurement, supplier coordination, and ensure the supermarket maintains optimal stock levels and product quality.
	Key Responsibilities
	Source and negotiate with suppliers for quality products.
	Prepare and process purchase orders.
	Track stock levels and reorder timelines.
	Maintain supplier records and purchase databases.
	Collaborate with finance and operations on restocking plans.


Requirements


	B.Sc/ND in Procurement, Supply Chain, or related field.
	3 – 5 years of procurement or inventory experience.
	Excellent negotiation and record-keeping skills.
	Proactive and organized individual.


Salary
N150,000 - N200,000 per month.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their  CV to: jobs@donquester.com using “Inventory / Buying Officer – Ojota Supermarket” as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply
